name: True Fantasy Live Online
summary: True Fantasy Live Online is an MMORPG which was in development by Level-5 for the Microsoft Xbox. After a long and troubled development cycle that lasted almost two years, the game was cancelled on June 2, 2004. Available development and promotional information depict a massive fantasy setting in which up to 3,000 users - each with their own fully customizable character - can set out on adventures with one another, fighting monsters and collecting various items.
